entry.title: whois 10c8
entry.content:
I’m William Fernandes, a Software Engineer in the hot East Coast of Brazil. I’m 19 years old and co-founder of Natoken Entertainment, currently working on a MOBA game called King’s Vessel as Lead Programmer and Character Designer. I love coffee, soft/hardware engineering, emulators, and my girlfriend ().

This site is about my thoughts, projects and things that I find interesting in general. All in plain English (hopefully).

You can check my stuff here and at my Github profile.

Feel free to get in touch with me at dev10c8 [at] gmail [dot] com
